Package com.im.njams.sdk.argos

Class ArgosSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.argos.ArgosSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public class ArgosSender
extends Object
implements Closeable
    This Singleton class cares about collecting and sending Argos Metrics via UPD to an nJAMS Agent. It will send every 10 seconds all available Metrics.

    To provide Metrics you must register an @see ArgosCollector.

      • init

        public void init​(Settings settings)
        Reads the properties "njams.sdk.subagent.host", "njams.sdk.subagent.port" and "njams.sdk.subagent.enabled" from the given settings.
        Parameters:
        settings - the settings for connection establishment

      • addArgosCollector

        public void addArgosCollector​(ArgosMultiCollector collector)
        Adds a collector that will create metrics every time run() is called.
        Parameters:
        collector - The collector that collects metrics

      • removeAllArgosCollectors

        public void removeAllArgosCollectors()
        Removes all collectors and closes the sender instance.

      • removeArgosCollector

        public boolean removeArgosCollector​(ArgosMultiCollector collector)
        Removes the given collector from the sender instance.
        Parameters:
        collector - The collector instance to be removed from the sender.
        Returns:
        true only if the given collector was registered with the sender.

      • start

        public void start()
        Tries to establish a connection and starts a sending thread.

        public void close()
        Stop the sending thread and close the connection
